item.title: THCon21 - Good old friend
item.description: THCon21 - Good old friend Go back to write-ups list Category: Reverse Creator: zephyr Description: Good old friend Attachments: goodOldFriend.apk Analysing the APK Android reverse engineering is by far my favorite subject. So let’s dive right into the analysis.
